Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.network.client.view.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, PropertyChangeListener, Runnable, EventListener
public class CLI extends Object implements View
Class that defines the command line view

    • getDisplayStyle

      public String getDisplayStyle(String styleName)
      This method gets CLI ANSI escape codes
      Parameters:
      styleName - name of ANSI property to search for
      Returns:
      String, an ANSI escape code or an empty string if those are not supported

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      This method receives model updates and prints model, CLI ignores most small updates as whole model is passed for TurnState updates after every action
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.

    • parseMessage

      public Message parseMessage(String[] input) throws MoveNotAllowedException
      This method parses client input to generate a message
      Parameters:
      input - the inputted args to parse
      Returns:
      Message the message that will be sent to the server
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - when passed args are invalid
